## Position interface

The positions of a value, with it's `x,y` coordinate in the matrix and it's `n` possition in the vector

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Position 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [n](./matrix-from-vector.position.n.md) | number | Position in the vector |
|  [x](./matrix-from-vector.position.x.md) | number | x coordinate in the matrix |
|  [y](./matrix-from-vector.position.y.md) | number | y coordinate in the matrix |
